name: Sicilian Style Hot Turkey Sausage

instructions.en: Combine the ground turkey or pork with all the remaining ingredients in a mixing bowl.
instructions.sk: V miske zmiešajte mleté morčacie mäso alebo bravčovinu so všetkými zvyšnými ingredienciami.
instructions.ja: ボウルに七面鳥または豚のひき肉と残りの全ての材料を入れて混ぜ合わせます。

instructions.en: Brown the mixture in a skillet over medium heat.
instructions.sk: Opečte zmes na panvici na strednom ohni do hneda.
instructions.ja: 中火のフライパンで混ぜ合わせた材料を炒めて茶色くなるまで調理します。

instructions.en: Drain any excess grease from the skillet.
instructions.ja: 余分な脂があれば取り除きます。

notes: This recipe makes enough to top 2-3 pizzas. The sausage will be a little dryer than commercial Italian sausage but has good flavor. Can be frozen.
